name: Force Open
description:
Using your body, a lever, or some other tool, you attempt 
to forcefully open a door, window, container or heavy gate. 
With a high enough result, you can even smash through walls. 
Without a crowbar, prying something open takes a –2 item 
penalty to the Athletics check to Force Open.

effects.criticalSuccess:
You open the door, window, container, or gate 
and can avoid damaging it in the process.
effects.success:
You break the door, window, container, or gate open, 
and the door, window, container, or gate gains the broken 
condition. If it’s especially sturdy, the GM might have it take 
damage but not be broken.
effects.criticalFailure:
Your attempt jams the door, window, container, 
or gate shut, imposing a –2 circumstance penalty on future 
attempts to Force it Open.
